text: Terribacillus goriensis is a Gram-positive, moderately halotolerant, strictly aerobic, rod-shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Terribacillus which has been isolated from sea water from Busan in Korea. ==References== == External links == *Type strain of Terribacillus goriensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Terribacillus goriensis
